links.title: WhatsApp gets approval to launch payments feature in India
links.description: CHENNAI (Reuters) - WhatsApp has received approval to roll out its payments service in India starting with 20 million users, the country's flagship payments processor said on Thursday, giving the Facebook-owned app an entry into a crowded digital payments space.
